name: Mike Miller
description: I can describe myself as a quiet, gentle, and kind person. I am self-confident, purposeful, ambitious, energetic, positive, honest, truthful, loving, caring, and God fearing man. I have a good sense of humor. I can be passionate I love animals very much, I love sports, namely golf. Also, I love rest among nature. And still, I like to read. I love rest in a warm circle of friends, or the loneliness of the house behind reading books. I believe in love and am a risk taker; the one who believes in his own abilities.
